channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Major fire erupts at MPs' quarters near Parliament in Delhi. What happened?
Putin-Trump summit: Can the Russian leader travel to Hungary despite an ICC warrant?
Andrew gives up royal titles amid Jeffrey Epstein scandal. But is he still a prince?
This Week in Explainers: How India’s air force has outranked China’s
History Today: When US purchased Alaska from Russia
Muammar Gaddafi’s son Hannibal released on bail. What happened to family after Libyan leader's death?
Recognising local units of global defence firms as 'Indian' will boost self-reliance
item.description: The move will help build a stronger military-industrial complex, cushion India from supply chain shocks, and shift the country from an import-heavy posture to a resilient and globally competitive defence ecosystem

item.title: Bangladesh must be saved from becoming the very Pakistan it broke away from
item.description: Bangladesh today stands at a defining moment—caught between the rise of Pakistan-style religious politics and a weakened democratic order

item.title: How India’s pragmatic approach to Taliban is best for regional stability
item.description: The Taliban now appear to have significant popular support and have maintained stability in much of Afghanistan, both militarily and politically-- which makes enaging with it a strategic necessity

item.title: Building the arsenal of trust: India–UK reset the rules of strategic cooperation
item.description: India–UK defence synergy stands out as both model and mandate for purposeful, adaptive cooperation

item.title: No, India has not ‘capitulated’ to Trump’s pressure on Russian oil, and neither have we suffered loss of autonomy
item.description: The US president seeks a face-saving off-ramp to seal the trade deal and we will give it to him

item.title: Trump’s Pakistan gamble should alarm India, Afghanistan
item.description: The US silence, as the ISI funds and shelters IS-KP members in Balochistan and builds centres for the LeT, JeM and Hizbul in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, is nothing but complicity in Pakistan’s sinister designs
